item.title: What Books I'm Reading
item.description: #2022 Thinking in Systems Donella H. Meadows Why We’re Polarized Ezra Klein You’re Never Weird on the Internet (Almost) Felicia Day The End of Everything (Astrophysically Speaking) Katie Mack Old Man’s War Series _John Scalzi_ Old Man’s War was John Scalzi’s debut novel and it is fantastic. I’ll be honest, I knew Scalzi from Twitter long before I read any of his novels. He seems to be a decent person who loves burritos1 and he writes some pretty great novels.
